title: Support Vector Regression
description: In this lab, we will use Support Vector Regression (SVR) to fit a model to a 1D dataset using linear, polynomial, and Radial Basis Function (RBF) kernels. We will use Python's scikit-learn library to perform the SVR.

meta.title: Mastering Support Vector Regression Techniques
meta.description: Explore the power of Support Vector Regression (SVR) to fit models to 1D datasets using linear, polynomial, and RBF kernels.
meta.keywords: support vector regression, SVR, machine learning, data modeling, linear regression
